results.title: Nuclear Magnetic Resonance-Based Metabolomic Analysis of the Anticancer Effect of Metformin Treatment on Cholangiocarcinoma Cells
results.text_hl: This work provides a mechanistic understanding of the anticancer effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment on @<m>DISEASE_Aural_Atresia_Congenital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C564321 @@@CAA@@@ cells, and is beneficial to further developments of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as an anticancer drug.

citations.NLM: Zhang J, Hang C, Jiang T, Yi S, Shao W, Li W, Lin D. Nuclear Magnetic Resonance-Based Metabolomic Analysis of the Anticancer Effect of Metformin Treatment on Cholangiocarcinoma Cells Front Oncol. 2020;10():570516. PMID: 33330044
